task.title: Download the Desktop app for Trello-PC instructions
task.shortdesc: A step-by-step set of instructions on how to download the desktop app for Trello on both PC and Mac computers.

taskbody.context:
This page includes both step-by-step instructions to download the desktop application for Trello on PC and Mac computers.
Materials for PC & Hardware Requirements:
Working Laptop/ desktop
Windows OS 10 or higher
Microsoft store account

step.cmd: Inorder to download the Trello desktop app for windows you must have a microsoft store account(Figure 1).
Once you have an account you can search for Trello or in a web browser of your choosing search for the Trello desktop app .

Find the version you need, if you are using PC download Windows/Pc version, for these instructions we will be following the windows parameters, once you have found the version you need click install(Figure 2).

If you are downloading from within a web broswer you will now be prompted to sign into the microsoft store, once you sign into the microsoft store you will now be able to start downloading the application. If you are already in the microsofrt store it will begin downloading.

After it is finished downloading, the appplicaion will run, click continue, then either select login or signup. if you already have a Trello account go ahead and login. If you do not have a Trello account proceed to make one by signing up.
Once you have done that you are now ready to use Trello as an application and no longer have to use it in a web browser.
